00011 class CMVCard implements CMObject {

00018  private $data = array();

00026  public function CMVCard($version = "3.0") {
00027   $this->add('VERSION', $version);
00028  }
00029  
00035  public function getVersion() {
00036   return $this->data['VERSION'][0];
00037  }
00038  
00045  public function setVersion($newVersion) {
00046   $this->data['VERSION'] = array($newVersion);
00047   return true;
00048  }
00049  
00058  public function get($property) {
00059   return $this->data[strtoupper($property)];
00060  }
00061  
00073  public function set($property, $value) {
00074   // $value must be an array
00075   if(!is_array($value))
00076    $value = array($value);
00077   
00078   $this->data[strtoupper($property)] = $value;
00079   return true;
00080  }
00081  
00095  public function add($property, $value) {
00096   // add multiple values
00097   if(is_array($value)) {
00098    foreach($value as $v)
00099     $this->add($property, $v);
00100    return true;
00101   }
00102   
00103   // add a single value
00104   $property = strtoupper($property);
00105   if(!isset($this->data[$property]))
00106    $this->data[$property] = array();
00107   array_push($this->data[$property], $value);
00108   return true;
00109  }
00110  
00122  public function addUnique($property, $value) {
00123   // add multiple values
00124   if(is_array($value)) {
00125    foreach($value as $v)
00126     $this->addUnique($property, $v);
00127    return true;
00128   }
00129   
00130   // add a single value
00131   $property = strtoupper($property);
00132   if(!in_array($value, $this->data[$property]))
00133    array_push($this->data[$property], $value);
00134   return true;
00135  }
00136  
00144  public function remove($property) {
00145   $property = strtoupper($property);
00146   if(isset($this->data[$property]))
00147    unset($this->data[$property]);
00148   return true;
00149  }
00150  
00156  public function generateVCard() {
00157   $r = "BEGIN:VCARD\n";
00158   foreach($this->data as $k => $v) {
00159    foreach($v as $value)
00160     $r .= "$k:$value\n";
00161   }
00162   $r .= "END:VCARD\n";
00163   return $r;
00164  }
00165  
00169  public function __toString() {
00170   if(isset($this->data['FN']))
00171    return "<" . get_class($this) . ": " . $this->data['FN'][0] . ">";
00172   return "<" . get_class($this) . ": (unnamed)>";
00173  }
